response.overview: Confined within the walls of their crumbling marital home, a divorcing couple receives earth-shattering news: their estranged son has died under suspicious circumstances. As grief metastasizes into suspicion, the son’s restless spirit materializes, bound to the house for seven nights to expose his killer. What unfolds is a spectral family reckoning—a raw dissection of despair, repressed rage, fractured mercy, and the crushing weight of parental guilt.
response.title: Seven Days After My Death
